value:
Heya, $Nu. Do
you want to duel? At dawn, perhaps?
I love dueling at dawn!

I joined the Greil Mercenaries after
Greil saved me. I had gone and
gotten myself captured.

There's no better pick-me-up than a
good ol' sparring session! You move,
you sweat, and before you know it...$k$pYou feel like your old self again!

Hey! Want your fortune read? Huh?
I don't seem like the type of person
who would be into that sort of thing?$k$pWell, fine then! I won't read yours!

I can't wait for my fortune to come
true. Did I ever tell you about it?$k$p"With white robes flowing in the
breeze, your archrival rides toward
you." Sounds amazing, right?!

There you are! You're
$Nu, right?
$Nf says hi!
I feel great! Let's keep going!

Not bad, not bad... Mastering the
sword is no easy task.

I guess I need to hone my skills
a bit more.

So this means you think I've got
what it takes? Nice!

I'm Mia, from the Greil Mercenaries.
I'm a graceful whirlwind of singing
steel! And I'll prove it, too!

Heya, Boss! It must be my lucky day
to run into you right now. No way
you're getting out of a spar this time!$k$pI won't take no for an answer! I'll teach
you how to hold a sword, and you
teach me about tactics and stuff.$k$pI've been keeping an eye on you ever
since you defeated me with those
tactics of yours.$k$pI want to become stronger myself, but
I also want an archrival that will grow
with me. You know?$k$pWe would train to defeat each other
in combat, and through victory and
defeat become all the more bonded.$k$pAnd then comes the final, decisive
battle! Isn't that just the most exciting
thing you can imagine?$k$pI knew you'd agree, Boss! So let's get
started! Don't worry, I'll go easy on
you... For now!
ええいっ！
よーし！
きゃああっ！
ま、まだまだぁ！
Today is a good day!
You're on!
Take that, foe!
Clash with me!
I've been beaten?
Ahaha
Heya, Boss! For some reason, I get the feeling there's something special about you...
Ack! You scared me! Hah, sneaking up behind me like that... You're a crafty one!
Want to spar for a bit?
Never mind the details! I'm counting on you, so just keep going!
What if my grand archrival...turned out to be you?!
If I lose today, I'll train harder and win tomorrow. And if I lose tomorrow, I'll train even harder for the next day...
You know what, Boss? I like you. So let's keep this good thing going.
Yeah!
Can't wait!
Let's go!
